entry.title: Awesome Cli Apps Updates on Oct 03, 2022
entry.content:
Development / Chat

  • rebound (‚≠ê4.1k) - Fetch Stack Overflow results on compiler error.
  • bcal (‚≠ê658) - Byte CALculator for storage conversions and calculations.
  • bitwise (‚≠ê680) - Base conversion and bit manipulation.
  • cgasm (‚≠ê377) - x86 assembly documentation.
  • add-gitignore (‚≠ê695) - Interactively generate a .gitignore for your project based on your needs.
  • is-up-cli (‚≠ê359) - Check if a domain is up.
  • reachable (‚≠ê37) - Check if a domain is up.
  • loadtest (‚≠ê2.6k) - Run load tests.
  • diff2html-cli (‚≠ê565) - Create pretty HTML from diffs.

Development / Frontend Development

  • surge - Publish static websites for free.

Development / Devops

  • ipfs-deploy (‚≠ê1.2k) - Deploy static websites to IPFS (‚≠ê23k).
  • Discharge (‚≠ê654) - Deploy static websites to Amazon S3.

Development / HTTP Server

  • serve (‚≠ê9.7k) - Serve static files (https, CORS, GZIP compression, etc).
  • simplehttp (‚≠ê67) - Easily serve a local directory over HTTP.
  • shell2http (‚≠ê1.4k) - Shell script based HTTP server.

Development / HTTP Client

  • HTTPie (‚≠ê36k) - A user-friendly HTTP client.
  • HTTP Prompt (‚≠ê9k) - Interactive HTTP client featuring autocomplete and syntax highlighting.
  • ain (‚≠ê614) - HTTP client with a simple format to organize API endpoints.

Utilities / Calendars

  • bitly-client (‚≠ê48) - Bitly client.

Data Manipulation / JSON

  • gron (‚≠ê14k) - Make JSON greppable.

Data Manipulation / YAML

  • dyff (‚≠ê1.5k) - YAML diff tool.

Files and Directories / Directory Listing

  • lsd (‚≠ê15k) - ls with many extra features.

Images / Emoji

  • imgur-uploader-cli (‚≠ê58) - Upload images to imgur.
  • pageres-cli (‚≠ê1.7k) - Capture website screenshots.

entry.title: Awesome Cli Apps Updates on Oct 01, 2022
entry.content:
Development / Devops

  • pm2 (‚≠ê42k) - Production Process Manager for Node.js.

Development / Release

  • release (‚≠ê3.6k) - Generate changelogs with a single command.

Utilities / Calendars

  • kill-tabs (‚≠ê391) - Kill all Chrome tabs.
  • alex (‚≠ê5k) - Catch insensitive, inconsiderate writing.

Utilities / Network Utilities

  • acmetool (‚≠ê2.1k) - Automatic certificate acquisition for ACME (Let's Encrypt).
  • certificate-ripper (‚≠ê806) - Extract server certificates.

Utilities / Theming and Customization

  • splash-cli (‚≠ê557) - Beautiful wallpapers from Unsplash.

Utilities / Shell Utilities

  • task-spooler - Queue jobs for linear execution.

Utilities / System Interaction Utilities

  • glances - System monitoring tool.
  • gzip-size-cli (‚≠ê191) - Get the gzipped size of a file.

Utilities / Markdown

  • glow (‚≠ê18k) - Styled markdown rendering.

Utilities / Security

  • hasha-cli (‚≠ê74) - Get the hash of text or stdin.

Utilities / Browser Replacement

  • s (‚≠ê2.4k) - Open a web search in your terminal.
  • hget (‚≠ê367) - Render websites in plain text from your terminal.
  • mapscii (‚≠ê8.3k) - Terminal Map Viewer.
  • nasa-cli (‚≠ê97) - Download NASA Picture of the Day.
  • getnews.tech (‚≠ê164) - Fetch news headlines from various news outlets.
  • trino (‚≠ê138) - Translation of words and phrases.
  • translate-shell (‚≠ê7.2k) - Google Translate interface.

Utilities / Internet Speedtest

  • speedtest-net (‚≠ê617) - Test internet connection speed and ping using speedtest.net.
  • speed-test (‚≠ê3.9k) - speedtest-net wrapper with different UI.
  • speedtest-cli (‚≠ê14k) - Test internet bandwidth using speedtest.net.
  • bandwhich (‚≠ê11k) - Track bandwidth utilization by process.

Files and Directories / Directory Navigation

  • fz (‚≠ê542) - Seamless fuzzy tab completion for z.

Version Control / Git

  • shallow-backup (‚≠ê1.3k) - Git integrated backup tool.

Version Control / Emoji

  • gitmoji-cli (‚≠ê4.8k) - Use emoji in commit messages.
  • gitmoji-changelog (‚≠ê392) - Generate gitmoji changelogs.

Images / Emoji

  • carbon-now-cli (‚≠ê5.9k) - Generate beautiful images of your code.
